trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Millville
There were no other sightings in Millville on or around July 31st 2005
Summary: windy day , orb seen under clouds
divs: Sighting Detailscoming out of garage, daughter looked up and said "what the heck is that??" i looked up and saw an orb moving underneath clouds against the wind direction of clouds in east sky. called wife and other daughter out ,they also saw it.it was moving between the cloud bottom and above tree line in forest, casting a glow on the tree line as it moved. we live near millville airport,are familiar with aircraft. this moved independent of wind and rapidly faded away in a straight line. we all had never seen anything move across sky in that manner except conventional aircraft.
